00010 MainComponent::MainComponent(DocumentWindow* mainWindow, ApplicationCommandManager* commandManager)
00011 :
00012 m_mainWindow(mainWindow),
00013 m_commandManager(commandManager)
00014 {
00015         //DBG_SCOPE();
00016         LOG_SCOPE();
00017         m_commandManager->registerAllCommandsForTarget(this);
00018         setApplicationCommandManagerToWatch(m_commandManager);

00021 #endif

00046 void MainComponent::resized()
00047 {
00048         button1->setBounds(getWidth() / 2 - 40, getHeight() - 100, 80, 30);
00049 }

00051 void MainComponent::paint(Graphics& g)
00052 {
00053         //DBG_SCOPE();
00054         LOG_SCOPE();
00055         addAndMakeVisible(button1);
00056         g.fillAll(Colours::dimgrey);
00057         g.setFont(30);
00058         g.drawText(m_text, getWidth()/2 - 100, getHeight()/2 - 40, 200, 80, 4, false);
00059         g.setFont(20);
00060         g.drawText(m_text2, getWidth()/2 - 100, getHeight()/2 , 200, 80, 4, false);
00061         m_image = ImageCache::getFromFile(File(File::getCurrentWorkingDirectory().getChildFile(XmlParser::getInstance().getPicturePath())));
00062         //m_image = ImageCache::getFromFile(File(XmlParser::getInstance().getPicturePath()));
00063         //m_image = ImageCache::getFromFile(XmlParser::getInstance().getPicturePath());
00064         g.drawImageAt(m_image, 0, 0, false);
00065         ImageCache::release(m_image);
00066         DBG_VAL(m_text2);
00067         DBG_VAL(m_text);
00068 }

00070 void MainComponent::buttonClicked(Button* button)
00071 {
00072         //DBG_SCOPE();
00073         LOG_SCOPE();
00074         if ( button == button1 )
00075         {
00076                 if (m_timerOn)
00077                 {
00078                         stopTimer();
00079                         m_text =String::empty;
00080                         repaint();
00081                         m_timerOn = false;
00082                 }
00083                 else
00084                 {
00085                         startTimer(500);
00086                         m_timerOn = true;
00087                 }
00088 
00089         }
00090 
00091         //LOG_VAL(button1->getName());
00092 }

00094 void MainComponent::timerCallback()
00095 {
00096         LOG_SCOPE();
00097         //DBG_SCOPE();
00098         if (m_schalter)
00099         {
00100                 m_text = T("Hallo");
00101                 repaint();
00102                 m_schalter = false;
00103         }
00104         else {
00105                 m_text = String::empty;
00106                 repaint();
00107                 m_schalter = true;
00108         }
00109         //DBG_VAL(m_schalter);
00110         LOG_VAL(m_schalter);
00111 
00112 }
